# meraki_networks_wireless_electronic_shelf_label (Data Source)



## Example Usage

```terraform
data "meraki_networks_wireless_electronic_shelf_label" "example" {

  network_id = "string"
}

  value = data.meraki_networks_wireless_electronic_shelf_label.example.item
}
```
